00030 extern int
00031 SyncSetCompErr(struct SyncNodeComposite *nc, int val) {
00032     SyncNoteErr("setErr");
00033     if (nc->err >= 0) nc->err = val;
00034     return val;
00035 }
00036 
00037 extern int
00038 SyncCheckCompErr(struct SyncNodeComposite *nc) {
00039     return nc->err < 0;
00040 }
00041 
00042 extern struct ccn_buf_decoder *
00043 SyncInitDecoderFromOffset(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d,
00044                           struct SyncNodeComposite *nc,
00045                           ssize_t start, ssize_t stop) {
00046     d = SyncInitDecoderFromCharbufRange(d, nc->cb, start, stop);
00047     return d;
00048 }
00049 
00050 /**
00051  * Makes a decoder from an element.
00052  */
00053 extern struct ccn_buf_decoder *
00054 SyncInitDecoderFromElem(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d,
00055                         struct SyncNodeComposite *nc,
00056                         struct SyncNodeElem *ep) {
00057     d = SyncInitDecoderFromCharbufRange(d, nc->cb, ep->start, ep->stop);
00058     return d;
00059 }

00061 
00062 extern void
00063 SyncNodeIncRC(struct SyncNodeComposite *nc) {
00064     int rc = nc->rc+1;
00065     if (rc > 0) nc->rc = rc;
00066 }
00067 
00068 extern struct SyncNodeComposite *
00069 SyncNodeDecRC(struct SyncNodeComposite *nc) {
00070     int rc = nc->rc;
00071     if (rc > 1) {
00072         nc->rc = rc-1;
00073         return nc;
00074     }
00075     nc->rc = 0;
00076     SyncFreeComposite(nc);
00077     return NULL;
00078 }

00080 ////////////////////////////////////////
00081 // Routines for comparison support
00082 ////////////////////////////////////////
00083 
00084 extern enum SyncCompareResult
00085 SyncNodeCompareMinMax(struct SyncNodeComposite *nc, struct ccn_charbuf *name) {
00086     ssize_t cmp = 0;
00087     
00088     cmp = SyncCmpNames(name, nc->minName);
00089     if (cmp < 0) return SCR_before;
00090     if (cmp == 0) return SCR_min;
00091     
00092     cmp = SyncCmpNames(name, nc->maxName);
00093     if (cmp < 0) return SCR_inside;
00094     if (cmp == 0) return SCR_max;
00095     return SCR_after;
00096 }
00097 
00098 
00099 extern enum SyncCompareResult
00100 SyncNodeCompareLeaf(struct SyncNodeComposite *nc,
00101                     struct SyncNodeElem *ep,
00102                     struct ccn_charbuf *name) {
00103     struct ccn_buf_decoder cmpDec;
00104     struct ccn_buf_decoder *cmpD = NULL;
00105     struct ccn_buf_decoder nameDec;
00106     struct ccn_buf_decoder *nameD = NULL;
00107     if (ep->kind & SyncElemKind_leaf) {
00108         // a leaf, as it should be
00109         cmpD = SyncInitDecoderFromOffset(&cmpDec, nc, ep->start, ep->stop);
00110         nameD = SyncInitDecoderFromCharbuf(&nameDec, name, 0);
00111         int cmp = SyncCmpNamesInner(nameD, cmpD);
00112         if (cmp == 0) return SCR_min;
00113         if (cmp == SYNC_BAD_CMP) return SCR_error;
00114         if (cmp < 0) return SCR_before;
00115         return SCR_after;
00116     } else {
00117         return SCR_inside;
00118     }
00119 }

00121 ////////////////////////////////////////
00122 // Routines for building CompositeNodes
00123 ////////////////////////////////////////
00124 
00125 // resetComposite resets a composite node to its initial state
00126 // except that it retains any allocated storage
00127 extern void
00128 SyncResetComposite(struct SyncNodeComposite *nc) {
00129     struct ccn_charbuf *cb = nc->cb;
00130     if (nc->minName != NULL) ccn_charbuf_destroy(&nc->minName);
00131     nc->minName = NULL;
00132     if (nc->maxName != NULL) ccn_charbuf_destroy(&nc->maxName);
00133     nc->maxName = NULL;
00134     if (nc->content != NULL) ccn_charbuf_destroy(&nc->content);
00135     nc->content = NULL;
00136     if (nc->hash != NULL) ccn_charbuf_destroy(&nc->hash);
00137     nc->hash = NULL;
00138     if (cb == NULL) {
00139         cb = ccn_charbuf_create();
00140         nc->cb = cb;
00141     }
00142     cb->length = 0;
00143     ccnb_element_begin(cb, CCN_DTAG_SyncNode);
00144     SyncAppendTaggedNumber(cb, CCN_DTAG_SyncVersion, SYNC_VERSION);
00145     ccnb_element_begin(cb, CCN_DTAG_SyncNodeElements);
00146     nc->longHash.pos = MAX_HASH_BYTES;
00147     nc->rc = 0;
00148     nc->refLen = 0;
00149     nc->err = 0;
00150     nc->leafCount = 0;
00151     nc->treeDepth = 1;
00152     nc->byteCount = 0;
00153 }
00154 
00155 // SyncAllocComposite allocates a new, empty, composite object
00156 extern struct SyncNodeComposite *
00157 SyncAllocComposite(struct SyncBaseStruct *base) {
00158     struct SyncNodeComposite *nc = NEW_STRUCT(1, SyncNodeComposite);
00159     nc->base = base;
00160     SyncResetComposite(nc);
00161     return nc;
00162 }
00163 
00164 // SyncExtendComposite extends the references section of a composite object
00165 // with a new offset
00166 // extending the encoding and obtaining the offset is handled separately
00167 extern void
00168 SyncExtendComposite(struct SyncNodeComposite *nc,
00169                     SyncElemKind kind,
00170                     ssize_t start, ssize_t stop) {
00171     int oldLen = nc->refLen;
00172     int newLen = oldLen+1;
00173     struct SyncNodeElem *refs = nc->refs;
00174     if (newLen >= nc->refLim) {
00175         // need to extend
00176         int newLim = newLen + newLen / 2 + 4;
00177         struct SyncNodeElem *lag = refs;
00178         refs = NEW_STRUCT(newLim, SyncNodeElem);
00179         if (lag != NULL) {
00180             if (oldLen > 0)
00181                 memmove(refs, lag, oldLen*sizeof(struct SyncNodeElem));
00182             free(lag);
00183         }
00184         nc->refLim = newLim;
00185         nc->refs = refs;
00186     }
00187     refs[oldLen].kind = kind;
00188     refs[oldLen].start = start;
00189     refs[oldLen].stop = stop;
00190     nc->refLen = newLen;
00191 }
00192 
00193 extern void
00194 SyncNodeMaintainMinMax(struct SyncNodeComposite *nc,
00195                        const struct ccn_charbuf *name) {
00196     struct ccn_charbuf *x = nc->minName;
00197     if (x == NULL) {
00198         x = ccn_charbuf_create();
00199         ccn_charbuf_append_charbuf(x, name);
00200     } else if (SyncCmpNames(name, x) < 0) {
00201         ccn_charbuf_reset(x);
00202         ccn_charbuf_append_charbuf(x, name);
00203     }
00204     nc->minName = x;
00205     x = nc->maxName;
00206     if (x == NULL) {
00207         x = ccn_charbuf_create();
00208         ccn_charbuf_append_charbuf(x, name);
00209     } else if (SyncCmpNames(name, x) > 0) {
00210         ccn_charbuf_reset(x);
00211         ccn_charbuf_append_charbuf(x, name);
00212     }
00213     nc->maxName = x;
00214 }
00215 
00216 extern void
00217 SyncNodeAddName(struct SyncNodeComposite *nc,
00218                 const struct ccn_charbuf *name) {
00219     struct ccn_charbuf *cb = nc->cb;
00220     ssize_t start = cb->length;
00221     SyncAppendElement(cb, name);
00222     ssize_t stop = cb->length;
00223     nc->leafCount++;
00224     SyncNodeMaintainMinMax(nc, name);
00225     SyncExtendComposite(nc, SyncElemKind_leaf, start, stop);
00226     SyncAccumHash(&nc->longHash, name);
00227 }
00228 
00229 extern void
00230 SyncNodeAddNode(struct SyncNodeComposite *nc,
00231                 struct SyncNodeComposite *node) {
00232     struct ccn_charbuf *cb = nc->cb;
00233     ssize_t start = cb->length;
00234     SyncNodeAppendLongHash(cb, node);
00235     ssize_t stop = cb->length;
00236     struct ccn_buf_decoder xds;
00237     struct ccn_buf_decoder *xd = SyncInitDecoderFromCharbufRange(&xds, cb, start, stop);
00238     SyncAccumHashInner(&nc->longHash, xd);
00239     SyncExtendComposite(nc, SyncElemKind_node, start, stop);
00240     unsigned nDepth = node->treeDepth+1;
00241     if (nDepth > nc->treeDepth) nc->treeDepth = nDepth;
00242     nc->byteCount = nc->byteCount + node->byteCount + node->cb->length;
00243     nc->leafCount = nc->leafCount + node->leafCount;
00244     SyncNodeMaintainMinMax(nc, node->minName);
00245     SyncNodeMaintainMinMax(nc, node->maxName);
00246 }
00247 
00248 extern int
00249 SyncNodeAppendLongHash(struct ccn_charbuf *cb, struct SyncNodeComposite *nc) {
00250     int pos = nc->longHash.pos;
00251     int len = MAX_HASH_BYTES-pos;
00252     int res = -1;
00253     if (len > 0) res = ccnb_append_tagged_blob(cb, CCN_DTAG_SyncContentHash,
00254                                                nc->longHash.bytes+pos,
00255                                                len);
00256     return res;
00257 }
00258 
00259 // SyncEndComposite finishes up the encoding
00260 // we can get into parsing problems for names and hashes
00261 extern void
00262 SyncEndComposite(struct SyncNodeComposite *nc) {
00263     if (!SyncCheckCompErr(nc) && nc->hash == NULL) {
00264         int res = 0;
00265         struct ccn_charbuf *cb = nc->cb;
00266         
00267         // terminate the references
00268         res |= ccnb_element_end(cb);
00269         
00270         // output the hash
00271         struct SyncLongHashStruct *hp = &nc->longHash;
00272         SyncNodeAppendLongHash(cb, nc);
00273         nc->hash = SyncLongHashToBuf(hp);
00274         
00275         // output the minName and maxName
00276         
00277         SyncAppendElement(cb, nc->minName);
00278         SyncAppendElement(cb, nc->maxName);
00279         
00280         res |= SyncAppendTaggedNumber(cb, CCN_DTAG_SyncNodeKind, nc->kind);
00281         res |= SyncAppendTaggedNumber(cb, CCN_DTAG_SyncLeafCount, nc->leafCount);
00282         res |= SyncAppendTaggedNumber(cb, CCN_DTAG_SyncTreeDepth, nc->treeDepth);
00283         res |= SyncAppendTaggedNumber(cb, CCN_DTAG_SyncByteCount, nc->byteCount);
00284         res |= ccnb_element_end(cb);
00285         if (res != 0) SyncSetCompErr(nc, -__LINE__);
00286     }
00287 }
00288 
00289 // freeComposite returns the storage for the composite object
00290 extern void
00291 SyncFreeComposite(struct SyncNodeComposite *nc) {
00292     if (nc == NULL) return;
00293     SyncResetComposite(nc);
00294     if (nc->cb != NULL)
00295         ccn_charbuf_destroy(&nc->cb);
00296     if (nc->refs != NULL) {
00297         free(nc->refs);
00298         nc->refs = NULL;
00299     }
00300     free(nc);
00301 }
00302 
00303 extern void
00304 SyncWriteComposite(struct SyncNodeComposite *nc, FILE *f) {
00305     fwrite(nc->cb->buf, sizeof(unsigned char), nc->cb->length, f);
00306     fflush(f);
00307 }
00308 
00309 extern int
00310 SyncParseComposite(struct SyncNodeComposite *nc, struct ccn_buf_decoder *d) {
00311     ssize_t startOff = d->decoder.token_index;
00312     unsigned char *base = ((unsigned char *) d->buf)+startOff;
00313     SyncResetComposite(nc);
00314     while (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_SyncNode)) {
00315         // the while loop is only present to let us break out early on error
00316         ccn_buf_advance(d);
00317         // first, get the version stamp
00318         uintmax_t vers = SyncParseUnsigned(d, CCN_DTAG_SyncVersion);
00319         if (SyncCheckDecodeErr(d) || vers != SYNC_VERSION) {
00320             SyncSetCompErr(nc, -__LINE__);
00321             break;
00322         }
00323         
00324         if (SyncCheckCompErr(nc) == 0 && ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_SyncNodeElements)) {
00325             // we have a refs section
00326             ccn_buf_advance(d);
00327             
00328             for(;;) {
00329                 SyncElemKind kind = SyncElemKind_node;
00330                 ssize_t start = 0;
00331                 if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_Name)) {
00332                     // a name, so it's a leaf
00333                     start = SyncParseName(d);
00334                     kind = SyncElemKind_leaf;
00335                 } else if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_SyncContentHash)) {
00336                     // a hash, so it's a composite
00337                     start = SyncParseHash(d);
00338                 } else  {
00339                     ccn_buf_check_close(d);
00340                     break;
00341                 }
00342                 if (SyncCheckDecodeErr(d))  {
00343                     SyncSetCompErr(nc, -__LINE__);
00344                     break;
00345                 }
00346                 ssize_t stop = d->decoder.token_index;
00347                 SyncExtendComposite(nc, kind, start, stop);
00348             }
00349             
00350         }
00351         if (SyncCheckCompErr(nc)) break;
00352         
00353         if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_SyncContentHash)) {
00354             const unsigned char * xp = NULL;
00355             size_t xs = 0;
00356             ccn_buf_advance(d);
00357             if (ccn_buf_match_blob(d, &xp, &xs)) {
00358                 ccn_buf_advance(d);
00359                 ccn_buf_check_close(d);
00360             } else {
00361                 nc->longHash.pos = 0;
00362                 SyncSetCompErr(nc, -__LINE__);
00363             }
00364             if (xp != NULL && xs > 0 && xs <= (ssize_t) MAX_HASH_BYTES) {
00365                 // fill the long hash from the raw hash bytes
00366                 // also fill the hash charbuf
00367                 int pos = MAX_HASH_BYTES-xs;
00368                 memcpy(&nc->longHash.bytes[pos], xp, xs);
00369                 nc->longHash.pos = pos;
00370                 nc->hash = SyncLongHashToBuf(&nc->longHash);
00371             } else {
00372                 // not so good
00373                 nc->longHash.pos = 0;
00374                 SyncSetCompErr(nc, -__LINE__);
00375             }
00376         } else {
00377             // we are supposed to have the hash code here
00378             SyncSetCompErr(nc, -__LINE__);
00379             break;
00380         }
00381         
00382         nc->minName = SyncExtractName(d);
00383         if (SyncCheckDecodeErr(d)) {
00384             SyncSetCompErr(nc, -__LINE__);
00385             break;
00386         }
00387         nc->maxName = SyncExtractName(d);
00388         if (SyncCheckDecodeErr(d)) {
00389             SyncSetCompErr(nc, -__LINE__);
00390             break;
00391         }
00392         
00393         nc->kind = (SyncNodeKind) SyncParseUnsigned(d, CCN_DTAG_SyncNodeKind);
00394         if (SyncCheckDecodeErr(d)) {
00395             SyncSetCompErr(nc, -__LINE__);
00396             break;
00397         }
00398         nc->leafCount = SyncParseUnsigned(d, CCN_DTAG_SyncLeafCount);
00399         if (SyncCheckDecodeErr(d)) {
00400             SyncSetCompErr(nc, -__LINE__);
00401             break;
00402         }
00403         nc->treeDepth = SyncParseUnsigned(d, CCN_DTAG_SyncTreeDepth);
00404         if (SyncCheckDecodeErr(d)) {
00405             SyncSetCompErr(nc, -__LINE__);
00406             break;
00407         }
00408         nc->byteCount = SyncParseUnsigned(d, CCN_DTAG_SyncByteCount);
00409         if (SyncCheckDecodeErr(d)) {
00410             SyncSetCompErr(nc, -__LINE__);
00411             break;
00412         }
00413         ccn_buf_check_close(d);
00414         if (SyncCheckDecodeErr(d)) {
00415             SyncSetCompErr(nc, -__LINE__);
00416         }
00417         break;
00418     }
00419     if (!SyncCheckCompErr(nc)) {
00420         // copy the needed bytes of the encoding
00421         // (note: clobbers anything in nc->cb)
00422         // use d->decoder.index instead of token_index here (no token at end)
00423         int len = d->decoder.index - startOff;
00424         if (len <= 0) {
00425             // should NOT happen!
00426             SyncSetCompErr(nc, -__LINE__);
00427         } else {
00428             struct ccn_charbuf *cb = nc->cb;
00429             cb->length = 0;
00430             ccn_charbuf_reserve(cb, len);
00431             unsigned char *dst = cb->buf;
00432             memcpy(dst, base, len);
00433             cb->length = len;
00434         }
00435     }
00436     return nc->err;
00437 }
00438 
00439 extern struct SyncNodeComposite *
00440 SyncNodeFromBytes(struct SyncRootStruct *root, const unsigned char *cp, size_t cs) {
00441     struct SyncNodeComposite *nc = SyncAllocComposite(root->base);
00442     struct ccn_buf_decoder ds;
00443     struct ccn_buf_decoder *d = ccn_buf_decoder_start(&ds, cp, cs);
00444     int res = SyncParseComposite(nc, d);
00445     if (res < 0) {
00446         // failed, so back out of the allocations
00447         SyncFreeComposite(nc);
00448         nc = NULL;
00449     }
00450     return nc;
00451 }
00452 
00453 extern struct SyncNodeComposite *
00454 SyncNodeFromParsedObject(struct SyncRootStruct *root,
00455                          const unsigned char *msg,
00456                          struct ccn_parsed_ContentObject *pco) {
00457     const unsigned char *cp = NULL;
00458     size_t cs = 0;
00459     int res = ccn_content_get_value(msg, pco->offset[CCN_PCO_E], pco,
00460                                     &cp, &cs);
00461     if (res >= 0 && cs > DEFAULT_HASH_BYTES) {
00462         // may be a node
00463         return SyncNodeFromBytes(root, cp, cs);
00464     }
00465     return NULL;
00466 }
00467 
00468 extern struct SyncNodeComposite *
00469 SyncNodeFromInfo(struct SyncRootStruct *root,
00470                  struct ccn_upcall_info *info) {
00471     return SyncNodeFromParsedObject(root, info->content_ccnb, info->pco);
00472 }
